vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.CashOut (0xb93430ce38ac4a6bb47fb1fc085ea669353fd89e.sol#21-28):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0xb93430ce38ac4a6bb47fb1fc085ea669353fd89e.sol#23-26)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (0xb93430ce38ac4a6bb47fb1fc085ea669353fd89e.sol#24)
